SEARCH
Package com.simcraft.entities

Class EnterClassroom

java.lang.Object
com.simcraft.entities.Entity
com.simcraft.entities.EnterClassroom
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable, Updateable
public class EnterClassroom extends Entity
Represents an interactive "Enter Classroom" entity in the game. This entity has a visual representation of a door and provides a method to get its bounds considering the game's scroll offset, making it suitable for collision detection with other game elements in a scrolling environment.

  • Constructor Details

    • EnterClassroom

      public EnterClassroom(int x, int y)
      Constructs an EnterClassroom entity at the specified coordinates. It loads the door sprite from the ImageManager.
      Parameters:
      x - The initial x-coordinate of the entity.
      y - The initial y-coordinate of the entity.

  • Method Details

    • render

      public void render(Graphics2D g2d)
      Renders the door sprite at its current position on the graphics context.
      Specified by:
      render in interface Renderable
      Overrides:
      render in class Entity
      Parameters:
      g2d - The graphics context to draw on.

    • render

      public void render(Graphics2D g2d, double scrollOffset)
      Renders the door sprite at its position, adjusted by the game's scroll offset. This is useful for rendering entities within the visible viewport of a scrolling game.
      Parameters:
      g2d - The graphics context to draw on.
      scrollOffset - The current horizontal scroll offset of the game world.

    • getBoundsWithScroll

      public Rectangle getBoundsWithScroll(double scrollOffset)
      Returns the bounding rectangle of the "Enter Classroom" entity, adjusted for the game's scroll offset. This is used for accurate collision detection in a scrolling environment.
      Parameters:
      scrollOffset - The current horizontal scroll offset of the game world.
      Returns:
      A Rectangle representing the entity's bounds in the scrolled view.

    • update

      public void update()
      Overrides the Entity.update() method. Currently, this entity does not have any dynamic behavior, so the method is empty. If the "EnterClassroom" entity needs to perform updates in the future (e.g., animation, interaction feedback), the logic should be added here.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Updateable
      Overrides:
      update in class Entity
